post.author: 이진경
post.content:
GTA-Programmer/Analyst

  Company Introduction:

Deighton Associates Limited has earned an international reputation for providing asset management software solutions. Deighton’s client list includes 18 US state DOTs, 4 Canadian provinces, 2 Canadian territories and agencies worldwide. For more information see our website at www.deighton.com .

Job Description:

• Develop and support both Win32 and web applications using custom databases and tools.
• Programming and support of RDBMS systems.
• Works efficiently with other team members or independently.


Ideal Candidate will possess:
• University degree or college diploma.
• Strong Programming and Database skills using .Net, Visual C++, SQL, Oracle, ASP, VB, C#, Java, ADO, DAO, Access.
• Analysis/Problem solving expertise.
• Strong GUI design capabilities.
• Excellent communication and people skills in order to communicate with team members and end users effectively.


Additional Information
Position Type: Full Time, Permanent  

Contact Information
jobs@deighton.com
Deighton Associates Ltd.
post.title: GTA-Programmer/Analyst
